com.sterlingcommerce.ui.web.framework.helpers

Class SCUIDataTypeHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sterlingcommerce.ui.web.framework.helpers.SCUIDataTypeHelper

  • public class SCUIDataTypeHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a helper class for data type handling. Any application requiring data type handling will need to call SCUIDataTypeHelper.
    which will turn around and call the registered implementation of ISCUIDataTypeProvider

    SCUIDataTypeHelper keeps an instance of ISCUIDataTypeProvider mapped to application Id in a HashMap.

    An Application can register only one implementation of ISCUIDataTypeProvider, an exception will be thrown
    if an application tries to register more than one implementation of ISCUIDataTypeProvider. hyadav
